PropertyValue.String: Reads universal journal entry items.
Reads the universal journal entry items available in your system.
Reads a universal journal entry item by key.
Reads a selected universal journal entry item for the provided key.
Reads the items of all company codes.
Reads the company codes available in your system.
Reads a company code by key.
Reads a selected company code for the provided company code key.
Reads the items of all cost centers.
Reads the cost centers available in your system.
Reads a cost center by key.
Reads a selected cost center for the provided key.
Reads the items of all profit centers.
Reads the profit centers available in your system.
Reads a profit center by key.
Reads a selected profit center for the provided key.
Reads the items of all chart of accounts.
Reads the chart of accounts available in your system.
Reads a chart of account by key.
Reads a selected chart of account for the provided key.
Reads the company code data of a specific universal entry item.
Reads the data of the company code of a specific universal entry item.
Reads the current cost center data of a specific universal entry item
Reads the master data of the current cost center of a specific universal entry item.
Reads the current profit center data of a specific universal entry item.
Reads the master data of the current profit center of a specific universal entry item.
Reads the chart of accounts data of a specific universal entry item.
Reads the data of the chart of accounts of a specific universal entry item.
